articles.author: Erik Pedersen, Patrick Hipes
articles.title: ‘Maria’ Wins Top Film Prize At American Society Of Cinematographers Awards: Full List - Deadline
articles.description: American Society of Cinematographers handed out its 39th ASC Awards on February 23. Here's the winners list, honoring 2024’s best in film and TV cinematography.
articles.content: Maria cinematographer Edward Lachman took the marquee Theatrical Feature Film prize at the 39th annual ASC Awards, which were handed out Sunday night at the Beverly Hilton. It’s the first major award… [+3744 chars]
